;Sunday, November 19, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;November 10, local time On the morning of the 7th, the 30th APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting was held at the Moscone Center in San Francisco, USA. President Xi Jinping attended the meeting and delivered an important speech entitled "Stick to the Original Aspirations, Unite and Cooperate to Work Together to Promote High-Quality Growth in the Asia-Pacific."
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Li Xueren

;
; ;

;■Since APEC established a regular leadership meeting mechanism , has always been at the forefront of global openness and development, effectively promoted regional trade and investment liberalization and facilitation, economic and technological development, and the flow of materials and people, creating the world-renowned "Asia-Pacific Miracle." Currently, the century-old changes in the world are accelerating and the world economy is facing various risks and challenges. As the engine of global growth, the Asia-Pacific shoulders greater responsibilities of the times. As leaders of the Asia-Pacific region, we must think deeply about what kind of Asia-Pacific we want to bring to the middle of this century. How to create the next "golden thirty years" of Asia-Pacific development? How can APEC better play its role in this process?

;

;■ We should uphold the original intention of Asia-Pacific cooperation, respond responsibly to the call of the times, work together to respond to global challenges, fully implement Putrajaya’s vision, and build an open, dynamic, strong, and peaceful Asia-Pacific community. Achieve common prosperity for the people of the Asia-Pacific and future generations

;

;■First, adhere to the innovation-driven approach. Second, adhere to the orientation of openness. Third, adhere to green development. Fourth, insist on universal benefit and sharing

;

;■China is comprehensively advancing the great cause of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation with Chinese-style modernization. China adheres to the path of peaceful development, adheres to high-quality development, adheres to high-level opening up, and uses Chinese-style modernization to provide new opportunities for promoting the modernization of countries around the world. China is willing to work with all parties to promote Asia-Pacific cooperation to achieve more fruitful results and jointly create the next "golden thirty years" of the Asia-Pacific.

;

;

;

; San Francisco, November 17, this newspaper   (Reporters Chen Yiming and Song Jingsi) On the morning of November 17, local time, the 30th APEC Leaders’ Informal Meeting was held at the Mosconi Center in San Francisco, the United States. President Xi Jinping attended the meeting and delivered an important speech titled "Stick to the Original Aspirations, Unite and Cooperate, and Work Together to Promote High-Quality Growth in the Asia-Pacific." (See the second edition for the full text of his speech)

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that since the establishment of the regular leadership meeting mechanism, APEC has always been at the forefront of global openness and development, effectively promoting regional trade and investment liberalization and facilitation, and economic development. Technological development and the flow of materials and personnel have created the “Asia-Pacific Miracle” that has attracted worldwide attention. Currently, the century-old changes in the world are accelerating and the world economy is facing various risks and challenges. As the engine of global growth, the Asia-Pacific shoulders greater responsibilities of the times. As leaders of the Asia-Pacific region, we must think deeply about what kind of Asia-Pacific we want to bring to the middle of this century. How to create the next "golden thirty years" of Asia-Pacific development? How can APEC better play its role in this process?

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that we should uphold the original intention of Asia-Pacific cooperation, respond responsibly to the call of the times, work together to respond to global challenges, fully implement the Putrajaya vision, and build an open, dynamic, strong, and peaceful Asia-Pacific community to achieve common prosperity for the people of the Asia-Pacific and future generations.

;

;First, adhere to the innovation-driven approach. We must more actively promote scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation and work together to create an open, fair, just and non-discriminatory scientific and technological development environment. Accelerate digital transformation, narrow the digital divide, support the application of new technologies such as big data, cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and quantum computing, and continuously shape new momentum and new advantages for the development of the Asia-Pacific. China has proposed APEC initiatives such as digital rural construction, corporate digital identity, and the use of digital technology to promote green and low-carbon transformation to better empower the development of the Asia-Pacific.

;

;Second, adhere to an open orientation. We must safeguard free and open trade and investment, support and strengthen the multilateral trading system with the World Trade Organization as its core, maintain the stability and smoothness of global industrial and supply chains, and oppose the politicization, weaponization, and pan-security of economic and trade issues. We must unswervingly promote regional economic integration and accelerate the process of the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Area. China successfully hosted the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum, injecting new impetus into promoting global connectivity and building an open world economy.

;

;Third, adhere to green development. We must adhere to the harmonious coexistence of man and nature, accelerate the green and low-carbon transformation of the development model, coordinately promote carbon reduction, pollution reduction, green expansion and growth, and cultivate a green foundation for Asia-Pacific growth. China adheres to the path of ecological priority and green development, and actively and steadily promotes carbon peak and carbon neutrality. We propose APEC cooperation initiatives on green agriculture, sustainable cities, low-carbon energy transformation, and marine pollution prevention and control to promote joint efforts to build a clean and beautiful Asia-Pacific.

;

;Fourth, insist on inclusive sharing. It is necessary to fully implement the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, promote development issues to return to the center of the international agenda, deepen the alignment of development strategies, and jointly solve the global development deficit. All parties are welcome to actively participate in global development initiatives, deepen cooperation in poverty reduction, food security, industrialization, development financing and other fields, and build a global development community so that people of all countries can share the fruits of modernization. China will continue to support APEC in carrying out economic and technological cooperation and jointly make the Asia-Pacific development pie bigger.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that China is comprehensively promoting the construction of a strong country and the great cause of national rejuvenation with Chinese-style modernization. China adheres to the path of peaceful development, adheres to high-quality development, adheres to high-level opening up, and uses Chinese-style modernization to provide new opportunities for promoting the modernization of countries around the world. China is willing to work with all parties to promote Asia-Pacific cooperation to achieve more fruitful results and jointly create the next "Golden Thirty Years" in the Asia-Pacific!

;

;The meeting was chaired by US President Biden, with the theme of "Creating a Strong and Sustainable Future for All."

;

;The meeting issued the "2023 APEC Leaders San Francisco Declaration".

;

;Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;; Sun, 19 Nov 2023 05:26:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 习近平回到北京http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/19/nw.D110000renmrb_20231119_2-01.htm
;Sunday, November 19, 2023
; ;

;Our newspaper, Beijing, November 18th  On the evening of November 18th, President Xi Jinping held a press conference in San Francisco After meeting with the President of the United States and attending the 30th APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting, he returned to Beijing by special plane.

;

;On the afternoon of November 17, local time, when Xi Jinping left San Francisco, San Francisco Mayor Breed and other U.S. representatives went to the airport to see him off.

;

;On the way to the airport, representatives of overseas Chinese and Chinese students gathered on both sides of the road, waving the national flags of China and the United States, warmly bid farewell to President Xi Jinping and congratulated the visit on a complete success.

;

;Cai Qi, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, Wang Yi, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Minister of Foreign Affairs and other accompanying personnel returned on the same plane.

;; Sun, 19 Nov 2023 05:26:03 +0800 01版要闻 - “在历史关头，我们共同作出了正确的选择”http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/19/nw.D110000renmrb_20231119_3-01.htm
;Sunday, November 19, 2023
; ;

;“This is another separate invitation that is different from the 30th APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting. "A Sino-US 'summit'." When the news came out that President Xi Jinping was going to the United States to attend the meeting between the heads of state of China and the United States, the world put a spotlight on this trip and defined this trip with "hope."

;

;Beijing-San Francisco spans nearly 10,000 kilometers across the vast Pacific Ocean. The journey has not been smooth.

;

;After decades of ups and downs, "a lot has happened" in Sino-US relations in the past year. Just as President Xi Jinping described it, even though we have reached the end of the road, there will always be a bright future.

;

;The establishment of diplomatic relations between China and the United States was a major event in the past 50 years, and in the next 50 years, "the most important thing in international relations is that China and the United States must find the right way to get along."

;

;How to get along with the world's two largest economies, which have different social systems and different stages of development, requires wisdom, structure, foresight and responsibility.

;

;China’s attitude is consistent. President Xi Jinping's trip itself conveyed a constructive attitude of being responsible for history.

;

;The 15th was the day after he arrived in San Francisco, and it was also a day when Sino-US relations went down in history.

;

;President Xi Jinping attended two events. One was a meeting at the manor; the other was a welcome banquet jointly organized by American friendship groups.

;

;The direction of Sino-US relations depends on both sides of the table in the Manor Meeting Hall, and also depends on the common choices of more than 1.7 billion Chinese and American people. President Xi Jinping said to President Biden: "Mr. President and I are at the helm of Sino-US relations and bear heavy responsibilities for the people, the world, and history."

;

;Excellent leaders of the older generation , once shouldered heavy responsibilities and made far-sighted strategic choices with a handshake across the Pacific. "So many things are always urgent; the world is changing and time is running out." "Seize the day and night" quoted during the China-US ice-breaking trip, is this not the current situation and trend faced by China-US relations today?

;

;“China-U.S. relations must be thought and planned against the backdrop of the accelerating changes in the world over the past century.” Today, in an era of intertwined events, the creation of the “San Francisco Vision” “brings great benefits to the people of the two countries.” to bring welfare and show responsibility for human progress." Like the other shore in front of the ocean, people in the storm can see hope and peace.

;

;"Our descendants will say that at this historical juncture, we jointly made the right choice." President Xi Jinping's eyes were profound and firm.

;

;;A rival or a partner? ;

;

;;“This is a fundamental and management issue”;

;

;On the morning of the 15th, President Xi Jinping drove into Fiji in a red flag car. Lowry Manor. This is a century-old country estate outside San Francisco. The sky is high, the clouds are wide, the grass and flowers are blooming, and the rich pastoral scenery is as far as the eye can see.

;

;President Biden is waiting at the gate of the meeting building. He walked down the steps to greet the Chinese guests who had come from afar.

;

;This meeting in San Francisco is "a year and a day" away from the meeting in Bali. Some people have described the downward spiral of Sino-US relations some time ago as a "roller coaster" with ups and downs that is heart-wrenching.

;

;In front of the magenta checkered wooden door, the two heads of state smiled and shook hands, walked into the meeting hall side by side, and left their expectations to the camera.

;

;The world is looking forward to a turnaround in Sino-US relations. The international community needs a stable Sino-US relationship more than ever.

;

;In the meeting hall, just like the last meeting in Bali, President Biden first started by talking about the exchanges between the two heads of state: "We have spent a lot of time together in the past ten years or so."

; p>;

;President Xi Jinping expressed the same emotion: "I also remembered that 12 years ago, as the Vice President of the United States, you invited me, then the Vice President of China, to visit the United States. That meeting is still vivid in my mind, and I am filled with emotion."

;

;Head-of-state diplomacy is the most powerful chapter in the long history of state-to-state relations.

;

;In recent years, meetings at the manor, night talks in Yingtai, autumn talks in the White House, long talks at the West Lake... every meeting and in-depth conversation between the heads of state of China and the United States has become a historical milestone in the relationship between the two countries, stirring up excitement. Long-lasting echoes.

;

;After long-term dealings, China has formed the fundamental principles for handling Sino-US relations: "mutual respect, peaceful coexistence, and win-win cooperation." During the meeting, President Xi Jinping said sincerely: "This is not only the experience extracted from the 50 years of Sino-US relations, but also the inspiration brought by the conflicts between major powers in history. It should be the direction of joint efforts between China and the United States."

;< p>; "He who gets the big can take the small." This ancient proverb from Ouyang Xiu, a great scholar in the Northern Song Dynasty, contains Eastern philosophy. President Xi Jinping has cited it many times, and it seems to be a window into China’s handling of Sino-US relations.

;

;“One is to strengthen unity and cooperation” and “the other is to adopt a zero-sum mentality.” President Xi Jinping pointed out concisely and comprehensively: “The two choices represent two directions and will determine the future of mankind and the future of the earth. ." The grand framework focuses on the strategic, overall and directional issues of Sino-US relations, looking beyond the two sides to the world.

;

;This scene touches the depths of history.

;

;In 1972, the handshake between Chairman Mao Zedong and President Nixon melted the long-standing ice.

;

;More than 50 years have passed in the blink of an eye.

;

;On this day, President Xi Jinping elaborated on the issue he has "been thinking about": "How to make the giant ship of China-U.S. relations avoid reefs and shoals, sail through strong winds and waves, and not yaw, stall, or collide?" ? The first thing to answer is whether China and the United States are rivals or partners. This is a fundamental and overarching question."

;

;The fundamental and overarching question is the "journey of the great road." .

;

;During the meeting, President Xi Jinping came up with solutions to the problem: "establish a correct understanding", "effectively manage differences", "promote mutually beneficial cooperation", "take on the responsibilities of a major country" and "promote people-to-people and cultural exchanges". Each item is defined by "common", which also clearly states China's attitude: "China is willing to be a partner and friend with the United States."

;

;In meetings, luncheons, and walks, the heads of state of China and the United States attended We spent more than 4 hours together in the manor. Meeting tables, banquet halls, flagstone paths, their topics are wide-ranging and in-depth.

;

;The two sides talked about the Taiwan issue. This is also the most important and sensitive issue in Sino-US relations. President Xi Jinping pointed out the key point: "The United States should embody its stance of not supporting 'Taiwan independence' in concrete actions, stop arming Taiwan, and support China's peaceful reunification. China will eventually be reunified and will inevitably be reunified."

;

;From From Bali to San Francisco, President Biden continued his promise of “four no-nos and one no-no”. "I would like to reiterate the five-point commitment made at the Bali meeting, namely: the United States does not seek a new Cold War, does not seek to change China's system, does not seek to strengthen alliances against China, does not support 'Taiwan independence,' and has no intention of conflict with China ."

;

;"We adhere to the one-China policy, and I will not change this." President Biden emphasized again at the press conference after the heads of state meeting.

;

;“You can see from a distance that the wind and waves are small, and from the sky you can feel that the sea is flat.”

;

;That night, when he met with Newsom, the governor of California, President Xi Jinping talked about the meeting and told The frankness and in-depthness of the meeting at the manor: "President Biden and I have known each other for many years, so when we met, we were all straightforward."

;

;;Is it you who loses and I win, or win-win cooperation? ;

;

;;"It is completely possible for mutual achievement, mutual benefit and win-win";

;

;As the four seasons come and go, they breed upward power and bury the seeds of great change. .

;

;At that time, when the "Shanghai Communique" was drafting, which was a symbol of breaking the ice in Sino-US relations, the "trade and exchanges" part did not arouse much interest from the US representative Kissinger: "No matter how hard we work, we will continue to work hard." At most, it only accounts for a very small share of our overall economy."

;

;At that time, it was impossible to imagine that the "marginal fields" they defined would grow into a magnificent chapter that would stir up the world.

;

;“China and the United States are the world’s top two economies, with an economic aggregate exceeding one-third of the world’s, a total population accounting for nearly a quarter of the world’s, and bilateral trade accounting for approximately one-fifth of the world’s. , the interests of both sides are very closely intertwined." President Xi Jinping recently used this set of data to illustrate the broad foundation of cooperation between the two countries and the vast space for win-win results.

;

;At Philoli Manor, President Xi Jinping detailed the cooperation blueprint to President Biden: "China and the United States have broad common interests in many fields, including traditional fields such as economy, trade, and agriculture, as well as climate change, artificial intelligence, etc. and other emerging areas."

;

;President Biden responded positively: "The United States is willing to continue to develop economic and trade relations with China, strengthen cooperation in important fields such as climate change, drug control, and artificial intelligence, and is happy to see the two countries increase direct flights. , expand exchanges in education science and technology and personnel exchanges.”

;

;“China and the United States’ respective successes are opportunities for each other” and “can achieve mutual success and achieve mutual benefit and win-win results.” These judgments of President Xi Jinping are consolidating Sino-US relations. cornerstone of development.

;

;Before the joint welcome banquet of American friendship groups that night, President Xi Jinping met with thirty or forty representatives of the American business community and shook hands with them one by one. Many people vividly described their stories of win-win cooperation with China in short words.

;

;At the subsequent dinner, when President Xi Jinping talked about "making the list of cooperation longer and making the cake of cooperation bigger," there was a wave of applause.

;

;In the era of globalization, the development of the two major "locomotives" of the world economy is destined to be one among you and one among me. The leaders of the two countries also interacted from time to time around "Made in China".

;

;At Philoli Manor, after the meeting, President Biden sent President Xi Jinping to the car.

;

;"This car is so beautiful."

;

;"Hongqi car, made in China."

;

;Time goes back to 2015. During that visit to the United States, President Xi Jinping talked with then-U.S. Vice President Biden on the eve of the meeting. Biden introduced that his tie was “made in China.”

;

;"The quality of your tie should be good. When you wear it, it is equivalent to advertising for them. I wonder if they will pay advertising fees?" President Xi Jinping said wittily.

;

;Across the Pacific Ocean, the fields of cooperation are vast and vast.

;

;Looking at economy and trade, bilateral trade volume has reached 760 billion US dollars, an increase of hundreds of times since the establishment of diplomatic relations, accounting for 1/5 of the world; looking at employment, two-way investment between China and the United States has supported millions of jobs in both countries. Jobs; looking at people's livelihood, Sino-US trade saves hundreds of dollars in costs for every American family every year...

;

;On the west coast of the Pacific, San Francisco's sister city of Shanghai, the sixth CIIE has just concluded. Participating American companies have become the highlight of this CIIE: the number exceeds 200, the highest number ever.

;

;Continue backtracking. In March this year, the China Development Forum attracted 67 foreign business leaders, many of whom were from the United States.

;

;Tesla, Microsoft, Apple, Intel, General Motors... Since the beginning of this year, the "heads" of American companies have visited China intensively. The detailed transoceanic route just confirms President Xi Jinping’s profound insights during the meeting: “Under the current situation, the common interests of the two countries have not been reduced, but have become more.”

;

;“Always think about the overall situation. Go in the right direction; always keep an eye on the general trend, which is the most powerful."

;

;On the one hand, there is the need for cooperation and win-win opportunities, and on the other hand, there is the escalation of friction and the risk of confrontation, resulting in a clear sense of gap in economic globalization.

;

;During the meeting, President Xi Jinping made no secret of the issues between China and the United States: "The United States continues to take measures against China in terms of export controls, investment reviews, and unilateral sanctions, which seriously damages China's legitimate interests." We hope that the United States will take China's concerns seriously, take action to lift unilateral sanctions, and provide a fair, just and non-discriminatory environment for Chinese companies."

;

;In the face of this concern, President Biden made clear his stance: " The U.S. and China are economically interdependent, and the United States is happy to see China develop and prosper, and does not seek to suppress or contain China's development, nor does it seek to decouple from China."

;

;Can these dialogues and consultations, these struggles and efforts dispel misunderstandings and misunderstandings? Build a high wall of sanctions to dispel the haze in Sino-US relations?

;

;The world is waiting.

;

;;Is it a natural chasm or a thoroughfare? ;

;

;;“I still remember the house number is 2911 Bonny Street” ;

;

;Firolli Manor, before the luncheon, President Biden I pulled out an old photo from my phone and asked President Xi Jinping with a smile: "Do you know this young man?"

;

;That was when Xi Jinping, then secretary of the Zhengding County Party Committee, visited San Francisco in 1985. Photo in front of the Golden Gate Bridge.

;

;That was also young Xi Jinping’s first trip to the United States. In the next 38 years, one arc after another was drawn on the Pacific Ocean. I have been there many times and met many American friends in China.

;

;Kissinger, Bill Gates, Schumer, Newsom... Over the past year, American friends and guests have visited China one after another, and President Xi Jinping cordially received them; "US-China Youth Student Exchange Association" in Washington State, USA Friends from all walks of life, Chairman of the U.S.-China Aviation Heritage Foundation and Flying Tigers veterans, and Ma Siyi, President and CEO of the Philadelphia Orchestra... Over the past year, President Xi Jinping has replied to American friends many times.

;

;Time is the proof. The friendship formed has deep roots and flourishes.

;

;On the evening of the 15th, President Xi Jinping made time to meet with old friends in the United States. Talk about memories, current situation, plans, meet again after a long absence, talk about endless things.

;

;The meeting was immediately followed by a joint welcome banquet of American friendship groups. President Xi Jinping stepped onto the podium, and the audience stood up and applauded warmly and continuously.

;

;In his speech at the banquet, President Xi Jinping frequently mentioned old friends. The speech was titled "Gathering the Power of the People of the Two Countries to Promote the Cause of Sino-US Friendship." It told people's friendship stories, including many of his own stories.

;

;The photo of the Golden Gate Bridge was clicked at the beginning.

;

;"This morning, President Biden didn't know where he pulled it out and showed it to me." President Xi Jinping talked about the episode of the heads of state meeting, and the audience burst into applause and laughter. one slice.

;

;The vivid memories and warm moments are profound because of the close relationship between people.

;

;"When I first visited the United States, I stayed at the home of Mr. and Mrs. Dvorchak in Iowa. I still remember that the house number was 2911 Bonny Street." Applause swept through the venue again.

;

;In 1985, young Xi Jinping led a Shijiazhuang corn inspection delegation to the "sister provinces and states" on the other side of the ocean. At that time, China and the United States had not long since established diplomatic relations, and the two peoples had a strong desire for exchanges. Local newspapers hailed the "Chinese visitor" as the town's superstar.

;

;President Xi Jinping was deeply impressed by this experience: "To me, they are the United States." To local residents, young Xi Jinping and his colleagues are China. The Chinese people's humility, studiousness, friendliness and affection quickly eliminated their doubts about China. This is the law of communication: Only by communicating with heart can you gain trust; only by communicating with affection can you stir up resonance.

;

;At this moment, Sarah Landi, who has white hair like snow, is sitting in the audience, listening intently. When young Xi Jinping visited Muscatine, Randy was in charge of the reception. Every time President Xi Jinping sees her in these years, he always chats cordially for a while.

;

;The Dvorcheck brothers also came to the scene. As soon as President Xi Jinping saw his brother Gary, who had left home to study, he said to him: "I was living in your room at that time, and I remember that I had sports clothes and football equipment. Your mother made a sumptuous breakfast the next day, and you said I still remember the name of the dish."

;

;The past events of 38 years ago are so treasured. I can treasure those years in my heart full of great things, just because I cherish and care for the friendship thousands of miles apart.

;

;No matter how thick the ice is, no matter how high the courtyard wall is, it will be dissolved by the connection of hearts.

;

;Country-to-country exchanges are not always smooth sailing. China and the United States have also been isolated and opposed for 22 years. It is their common interests that allow China and the United States to transcend their differences, and it is the people's desire that allows the two countries to break the ice. From a game of "small ball turning big ball" to a Sino-US "Shanghai Communique" with historical weight, to now, bilateral trade of 760 billion U.S. dollars and a total of more than 260 billion U.S. dollars of two-way investment, 284 pairs of sister provinces and states With sister-city relations, there are up to more than 300 flights per week and more than 5 million mutual exchanges every year... This is a magnificent picture jointly drawn by nearly a quarter of the world's population.

;

;"Recently, Flying Tigers veterans, 103-year-old Moyer and 98-year-old McMullen came to China, climbed the Great Wall, and were warmly welcomed by the Chinese people." President Xi Jinping said here , looking at the veterans sitting in the audience, Moyer waved. Applause rang out to pay tribute to the turbulent years of fighting side by side.

;

;There are also members of the "Friends of Guling" who specially wore red Tang suits and red ties today because "red represents happiness in China."

;

;During the nearly 40-minute speech, the packed banquet hall burst into long and warm applause nearly twenty times. Of course, there were also laughter and admiration, and some old friends shed tears while listening.

;

;On the morning of that day, the heads of state of China and the United States reached a consensus that the two countries would launch more measures to facilitate personnel exchanges and promote people-to-people and cultural exchanges. The Pacific Admiral will thus build more bridges.

;

;The foundation of Sino-US relations is laid by the people, the door is opened by the people, the story is written by the people, and the future is created by the people. "It is the trickle-down flow of goodwill and friendship that makes the vast Pacific no longer a natural chasm; it is the people's two-way rush that makes China-US relations return to the right track from the bottom time and time again." President Xi Jinping said emotionally.

;

;The story of friendship between the two peoples is still being written.

;

;;Is it a challenge or an opportunity? ;

;

;;“Show the pattern of a big country, take on the responsibilities of a big country, and play the role of a big country”;

;

;The world has an extraordinary view of the “big guy” China of curiosity. From poverty to the largest developing country and the world's second largest economy, China's growth rate and the governance behind it have attracted the attention of the world.

;

;Is China a challenge or an opportunity to the world?

;

;The trip to San Francisco was a vivid narration of China on the world stage.

;

;From President Xi Jinping’s rich agenda, it is not difficult to read what “doing China’s affairs well is the greatest contribution to the world” and what “the Chinese people not only hope for a good life for themselves, but also hope for People of all countries are living well."

;

;A large country accounting for nearly one-fifth of the world’s population has created a miracle in the history of human poverty reduction. During the dinner speech, President Xi Jinping shared his personal experience. It has lifted nearly 100 million people out of poverty in eight years, which can be called a "miracle in the annals of history." This process "achieved the poverty reduction goals of the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development 10 years ahead of schedule."

;

;A large country occupying 1/15 of the world’s land area is committed to sustainable development. Whether it is the implementation of the Paris Agreement or the implementation of the goal of "peak carbon neutrality", China is taking action. “We don’t talk big words, we do what we say.” The thunderous applause echoed that China must be true to its words and resolute in its deeds.

;

;A country that used to be poor, weak, and full of waste, has explored a Chinese-style modernization path that is very different from the West, and created a new form of human civilization. This is "the creation of the brave."

;

;President Xi Jinping profoundly explained China-style modernization to President Biden and the American people. Its five characteristics correspond to unity and struggle, common prosperity, all-round development, sustainable development and peaceful development.

;

;Some observers of international issues commented on this speech: "In every sentence, we can discover what China is thinking and China's opportunities. We all know that China's opportunities are also opportunities for the world." ”

;

;So, is China’s development a threat to the United States?

;

;The "Thucydides Trap" has almost been regarded as the "iron law" of international relations. As time passes to the 21st century, Sino-US relations have become a new focus. Does the vast earth have enough space to accommodate China and the United States? President Xi Jinping has emphasized this many times: "There is no 'Thucydides Trap' in the world, but repeated strategic misjudgments among major powers may create a 'Thucydides Trap' for themselves."

;< p>;Across the Pacific, the road is at your feet.

;

;"As the largest developing and developed countries in the world, China and the United States must deal with each other well. Facing a world of chaos, China and the United States need to have a broad mind, show the pattern of big countries, and take on the responsibilities of big countries. , play the role of a major country." China is on the right side of history.

;

;Political diplomacy, cultural exchanges, global governance, military security... This meeting between the heads of state of China and the United States reached more than 20 consensuses, involving all dimensions of the global governance order, injecting stability and positive energy into a world intertwined with chaos. .

;

;Strengthen cooperation in important fields such as climate change, drug control, and artificial intelligence; exchange views on international and regional issues of common concern such as the Palestinian-Israeli conflict... At the meeting table and in the banquet hall, the heads of state of China and the United States focused on Not only bilateral relations, but also thorny problems that need to be solved in the region and the world.

;

;Solving the troubles facing human society cannot be separated from the cooperation of major powers.

;

;The method, path and sincerity of cooperation determine the result. President Xi Jinping made two points in this regard. The first is to "set an example" and "provide more public goods to the world"; the second is "the initiatives put forward by both sides must be open to each other and can be coordinated and docked to form synergy and benefit the world."

;

;On the eve of the trip to San Francisco, the third "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum has just been successfully held. Ten years, a drop in the ocean, has created tremendous changes.

;

;"The Belt and Road Initiative, as well as the global development initiative, global security initiative, and global civilization initiative proposed by China, have always been open to all countries, including the United States. China is also willing to participate in the multilateral cooperation initiatives proposed by the United States. "When planning for profit, you should plan for the benefit of the world. This is China's ambition.

;

;During the speech, there was one place where the applause was particularly lasting, that was when President Xi Jinping shared his thoughts.

;

;Recalling his visit to the countryside in a small village in northern Shaanxi when he was young, he said emotionally: "Half a century has passed from then to now. I feel at ease among the people. Being with the people makes me feel at ease." I have strength. I will be selfless and live up to the people. This is my lifelong belief." There was another warm applause at the venue.

;

;A lifelong belief is also the logical starting point for understanding China. "The people's yearning for a better life is our goal, and it is the people's hearts that must be kept."

;

;For the people, we also rely on the people. When meeting with friendly people, President Xi Jinping met with Adam Foster, a descendant of Edgar Snow, the author of "Red Star Over China". He said: "The Chinese people have always remembered Snow, who was the first to introduce the Chinese Red Army to the world."

;

;Today's world's impression of China, as conveyed in this book, has experienced The baptism of the Long March became more and more courageous, full of faith and yearning for the future.

;

;"Decoupling and breaking links" and "building walls and fortresses", even if the winds are high, the waves are strong, and the rain is coming, "all suppression and containment will only stimulate the will and enthusiasm of the Chinese people." During the meeting at the Manor, President Xi Jinping firmly said: "China's development and growth have endogenous logic, which cannot be stopped by external forces."

;

;The endogenous logic here is rooted in the suffering and glory of the Chinese nation and nourishes it. to the majestic power of the Chinese people. Across the sea of ​​clouds, we look at each other with our hearts.

;; Sun, 19 Nov 2023 05:26:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 为了亚太人民和子孙后代的共同繁荣http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/19/nw.D110000renmrb_20231119_4-01.htm
;Sunday, November 19, 2023
; ;

;San Francisco in November is sometimes sunny and sometimes drizzly. The Golden Gate Bridge is full of traffic, white sails are dotted on the blue sea, and gulls are flying. The cool and moist air carries the message of the Pacific sea breeze.

;

;At the invitation of US President Biden, President Xi Jinping went to San Francisco, the United States, from the 14th to the 17th to hold the China-US Presidential Meeting. He was also invited to attend the 30th APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

;

;Departing from Beijing and flying across the vast Pacific Ocean, President Xi Jinping’s special plane successfully arrived in San Francisco after more than 10 hours of flight. California Governor Newsom, Treasury Secretary Yellen and other senior officials warmly welcomed him at the foot of the gangway.

;

;“The first time I came to the United States was to San Francisco, right here.” President Xi Jinping’s words were cordial. "1985," Newsom added with a smile. Yellen once served as the president of the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco. This time she also warmly welcomed President Xi Jinping as a "local".

;

;This metropolis on the west coast of the United States has witnessed the century-old history of exchanges between the people of China and the United States, as well as the efforts of China and the United States to build a better world. This time it will witness a new milestone in the history of international relations.

;

;In 1945, China and the United States jointly participated in the San Francisco Constitutional Convention and promoted the establishment of the United Nations. China was the first to sign the United Nations Charter. Looking back at the highlight moment of "the last time San Francisco brought global leaders together," CBS reported that for San Francisco, this APEC meeting will be a rare "opportunity of the century."

;

;In four days, there were more than 10 bilateral and multilateral activities. Attracting worldwide attention, President Xi Jinping has intensively interacted with all parties, setting the course for China-US relations, drawing a blueprint for Asia-Pacific cooperation, and injecting strong confidence and impetus into regional and world peace, stability, development and prosperity.

;

;The steps are dusty and dusty, but the magnanimity of the world is in mind. Through President Xi Jinping's "San Francisco Time", the world listened to the sonorous footsteps of major-country diplomacy with Chinese characteristics in the new era, and witnessed a major Eastern country's dedication and responsibility to seek progress for mankind and unity for the world.

;

;;(1);

;

;;Shaping: "What kind of Asia-Pacific should we bring to the middle of this century?";; p>;

;This is the 30th time that APEC leaders have gathered. At such a historical node, when we look back and look ahead, we can better understand the mighty tide of the world.

;

;Thirty years ago, shortly after the end of the Cold War, leaders in the Asia-Pacific region followed the trend of the times for peace and development and held the first informal meeting of APEC leaders. They unanimously agreed to transcend the old rules of group confrontation and zero-sum game. thinking, deepen regional economic cooperation and integration, and strive to jointly build a dynamic, harmonious and prosperous Asia-Pacific family.

;

;Over the past 30 years, this mechanism has pushed the development and economic globalization of the Asia-Pacific into the fast lane, helping the Asia-Pacific become the center of world economic growth, the anchor of global development stability, and a highland for cooperation.

;

;What profound enlightenment does the extraordinary journey of Asia-Pacific cooperation bring to us? On the 16th, in a written speech delivered to the APEC Business Leaders Summit, President Xi Jinping shared his profound thoughts with the world -

;

;Openness and inclusiveness are the main theme of Asia-Pacific cooperation;

;

; Common development is the overall goal of Asia-Pacific cooperation;

;

;Seeking common ground while reserving differences is a good practice for Asia-Pacific cooperation.

;

;The language is incisive and contains philosophy. Draw wisdom and strength from history and let the light of thought illuminate the way forward.

;

;“The Asia-Pacific cannot and should not be reduced to a battlefield of geopolitical games, let alone a ‘new cold war’ and camp confrontation.” “Only cooperation can development, non-cooperation is the biggest risk, and ‘decoupling and disconnection’ are "Chain is not good for anyone", "Adhere to open regionalism", "Build an open Asia-Pacific economy with win-win cooperation", "Promote digital, intelligent and green transformation and development"...

;

;China has a strong voice China's position and China's plan of integrating knowledge and action will gather strength for the lasting stability, prosperity and development of the Asia-Pacific.

;

;In the press center of the conference, a stack of speech scripts was snatched away. After receiving them, reporters read them carefully and rushed to send out news.

;

;The full text of the speech was published on the website of the San Francisco Observer on that day. The editor's note reads: We rarely publish the full text of political speeches, but President Xi Jinping's speech is extremely unusual. It contains information that is highly anticipated by the American business community, policymakers, and the world, and will be widely and deeply studied.

;

;“Thought-provoking”, “inspiring” and “pointing out the direction for the Asia-Pacific to work together to achieve common development and prosperity”... President Xi Jinping’s speech was highly praised by business people in the Asia-Pacific region.

;

;The greatness of a great country lies in its broad mind, great structure and great responsibility.

;

;Since 2013, President Xi Jinping has attended or chaired all APEC leaders’ informal meetings and delivered important speeches, planning for regional cooperation, shaping the overall pattern, and planning a future for the common destiny of the Asia-Pacific people.

;

;From proposing to establish a "consciousness of a community with a shared future in the Asia-Pacific" to advocating the joint construction of an "Asia-Pacific partnership of mutual trust, tolerance, cooperation and win-win", from describing the "Asia-Pacific Dream" to outlining "all-round connectivity" "Blueprint" to maintaining a smooth global supply chain and industrial chain...China's ideas and China's actions lead the Asia-Pacific ships to cut through the waves and keep moving forward.

;

;Currently, the century-old changes in the world are accelerating, and the world economy is facing a variety of risks and challenges. As the engine of global economic growth, the Asia-Pacific shoulders greater responsibilities of the times.

;

;"As leaders of the Asia-Pacific region, we must think deeply about what kind of Asia-Pacific we want to bring to the middle of this century? How to create the next 'golden thirty years' of Asia-Pacific development? In this period How can we better play the role of APEC in the process?”

;

;At the 30th APEC Leaders’ Informal Meeting held on the 17th, President Xi Jinping delivered an important speech, laying the foundation for the new era facing the Asia-Pacific. Solve problems and promote Asia-Pacific cooperation to start again -

;

;Adhere to innovation-driven; adhere to open-oriented; adhere to green development; adhere to inclusive sharing.

;

;“We should uphold the original intention of Asia-Pacific cooperation, respond responsibly to the call of the times, work together to respond to global challenges, fully implement Putrajaya’s vision, and build an open, dynamic, strong, and peaceful Asia-Pacific community. Achieve common prosperity for the people of the Asia-Pacific and future generations." President Xi Jinping's words won widespread approval from leaders of all participating economies.

;

;;(2);

;

;;Leader: "This earth can accommodate China and the United States. The success of China and the United States is an opportunity for each other." ";

;

; The Asia -Pacific Economic Cooperation Organization Leaders and the host guests held on the 16th and the host guests' informal dialogue and work luncheon, with the issue of" sustainable, climate and impartial energy transformation ". During the gap between the meeting, the Sino -US dollar meeting held the previous day became the focus of discussion.

;

; "Congratulations!" "It's great!" Seeing President Xi Jinping, many leaders came forward and congratulated the successful meeting of the China -US dollar. Chang Shu breathed. "

;

; On the 15th, the Florer Manor, Flower and Timber, President Xi Jinping with President Xi Jinping with President Xi Jinping with President Xi Jinping.

;

; The United States specifically stated that the first meeting of the China -US dollar was a separate invitation issued by President Bayeng to President Xi Jinping. Unlike the bilateral meeting arrangements during the informal meeting of the Asia -Pacific Economic Cooperation Organization. This is a Sino -US "Summit".

;

; At 11:15 am, when President Xi Jinping arrived by car, President Biden was waiting in front of the main building. Hand hands, group photos, and step by side into the talk hall.

;

; "This earth can accommodate China and the United States. The success of China and the United States is the opportunity of each other." After the seat, President Xi Jinping opened Mingyi. At this meeting, the meeting was exactly one year and one day.

;

; In the past year, the United States has experienced serious "action deficits" in implementing Bali consensus, and even runs counter to the spirit advocated by consensus, leading to new difficulties in bilateral relations. In recent months, senior US government officials have visited China many times, and bilateral high -level interactions have increased significantly. The relationship between the two countries has stopped falling and stabilized and positive.

;

; "Mr. I and President and I are the helm of Sino -US relations. They are responsible for the people, the world, and history." Responsibility.

;

; "I always think that US -China relations are the most important bilateral relations in the world. The US -China conflict is not inevitable. A stable and developing China meets the interests of the United States and the world." President Bayeng said.

;

; "Establishing correct cognition together", "common effective management and control", "joint promotion of mutual benefit cooperation", "joint responsibility for the big country", "joint promotion of cultural exchanges together" ... The stable development of Sino -US relations has five pillars.

;

; On the basis of mutual respect and peacefulness, leaders of the two countries have discussed dialogue and cooperation in various fields, and have reached more than 20 consensus in the fields of political diplomacy, humanistic exchanges, global governance, and military security.

;

; Meeting, luncheon, walking, and using the same pass throughout the process, the heads of state of the two countries talked solidly for 4 hours. When saying not to say, President Xi Jinping said: "Believe our relationship will keep it." "I agree." President Biden responded.

;

; During the meeting, the media captured such an instant-

;

; Before the luncheon, President Bayeng specifically showed a photo in President Xi Jinping. It was in 1985. Xi Jinping, the secretary of Ren Zhengding County Party Committee, took a photo in front of the Golden Gate Bridge. "You haven't changed at all!" President Biden said. There was a bright laugh at the scene.

;

; 38 years later, the fingers are waved. From the county party secretary to the leader of the great power, Xi Jinping always believed that the foundation of Sino -US relations was poured by the people, and the gate of Sino -US relations was opened by the people. The story of Sino -US relations was written by the people. The future of Sino -US relations is Created by the people.

;

; On the night of the 15th, the center of San Francisco and the American friendly group jointly held a banquet to welcome President Xi Jinping. Flying Tigers, descendants of General Stiway, "Friends of Guling", friends in Aiwa, Washington, ... about 400 new friends and friends gathered together, the scene was very enthusiastic.

;

; "When I first visited the United States, I lived in the Davachek couple who lived in Aiwa. I still remember that the house number was No. 2911 Bonnie Street." The tenderness was moving. The people present at the scene of President Xi Jinping warmly applauded with nearly twenty times.

;

; "The more difficult it is, the more you need to tighten the people of the people and enhance the communication of the people's hearts. More people need to stand up for Sino -US relations drums and calls." President Xi Jinping pointed out.

;

; "President Xi Jinping, welcome you to visit the Jindibari Farm, and then open a tractor." Everyone at the scene "... The American people responded enthusiastically, saying that they would continue to inherit and develop good and Chinese friendship.

;

; The Pacific Ocean is large enough to accommodate the stream of the world;

;

; Under the rudder of the heads of state of the two countries, the giant round of Sino -US relations crossed the reef beach and arrived in San Francisco from Bali. But San Francisco is not the end, but it should be a new starting point.

;

; ; (3) ;

;

; ; responsibility: "Next 'China', still China" ;

;

; On November 16, the Chinese delegation's delegation was endless and became a "home" of Chinese bilateral diplomacy during the multilateral international conference.

;

; In the dense and compact schedule, President Xi Jinping arranged time to hold a bilateral meeting with many foreign leaders who attended the relevant activities of the Asia -Pacific Economic Cooperation Leadership Leadership Leaders.

;

; Some come from Latin America, which is thousands of miles away from China-

;

; "Before talking about other topics, I will first take this opportunity to express your gratitude." Mexican President Lopez talked about a past.

;

; "At our most difficult moment, China was the first country to help us." President Lopez was a little emotional. "China has set up a bridge with an empty bridge, which has continued to send shortages to us. Medical supplies help us through the difficulties. "

;

; The world has gone out of the new crown epidemic, but President Lopez still feels in the emergency helping China. Seeing President Xi Jinping, he couldn't wait to express gratitude.

;

; "We may not find another planet for human survival in our lifetime." During the trip to San Francisco, this sentence that Chairman Xi Jinping said was thoughtful.

;

; Although it is located in different continents and is far away, it is also a member of the Asia -Pacific family, the residents of the Earth Village, and a community of human destiny.

;

; Some are the Pacific Island countries that are far away from China-

;

; "China is a great country, and always adheres to the equality of countries, and the Filial side admires the world leadership of President Xi Jinping." Lantuka, who met with Xi Jinping for the first time after taking office for the first time.

;

; "China's development with the Pacific island nation is frank, without selfishness, and not targeting third parties." President Xi Jinping's words mean.

;

; Although the national conditions are different, Prime Minister Landuka is still eagerly looking forward to seeking inspiration from the successful road of Chinese -style modernization.

;

; He sincerely stated: "President Xi Jinping's global development initiative, global security initiative, and global civilization initiative are conducive to maintaining and promoting the development and interests of global southern countries. Choose and take the road to modernization. "

;

; Some are friendly neighbors that look at the sea across the sea-

;

;" I still remember our meeting in Bangkok. During the informal meeting of the leaders of the Asia -Pacific Economic Cooperation Organization. "Brunei Sultan Ha Sannal said that Brunei and China have a long history of friendship and China. High -quality co -construction of the "Belt and Road".

;

; "Seeing old friends again today, I feel very kind." President Xi Jinping said that China attaches great importance to East Asian cooperation and is willing to work with ASEAN countries such as Brunei to promote regional economic integration and maintain the correct direction of East Asian cooperation.

;

; Some are close neighbors with water with Chinese clothes —

;

; Seeing it again after a year. The positioning of the relationship between the two countries that comprehensively promote the relationship between the strategic and reciprocity is committed to the constructive and stable Sino -Japanese relations that meet the requirements of the new era.

;

; ...

;

; No matter the size of the country, no matter where, everyone gathers together, and there is a common wish: jointly build a peaceful, stable, and prosperous Asia -Pacific family. The relationship and cooperation with China is very important.

;

; The 20th China Communist Party held more than a year ago, opened a new journey of comprehensively promoting the construction of a strong country and a great cause of national rejuvenation with the modernization of Chinese -style modernization. What will China bring to the Asia Pacific and the world in the new journey?

;

; After the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, President Xi Jinping's first trip to the United States, told the vivid and wonderful Chinese story to the United States, Asia Pacific, and the world from different dimensions.

;

; "Not long ago, we successfully held the 6th China International Import Expo, attracting more than 3,400 companies from 128 countries including the United States, and the largest 6 consecutive exhibition area in the United States." At the joint welcome banquet of friendly groups, President Xi Jinping talked about the expo that has just been successfully held to explain to the world with real numbers that "more than 1.4 billion Chinese people's moving towards modernization is a huge opportunity for China to bring to the world."

;

; "Now, the global photovoltaic power generation capacity is nearly half in China. Dafeng realized carbon neutrality before 2060. We talk about it. "Talking about the green development that the parties care about, President Xi Jinping depicts a beautiful vision of the harmonious coexistence of the future people and nature.

;

; "Last month, China successfully held the 3rd 'Belt and Road' International Cooperation Summit Forum, forming 458 results. Chinese financial institutions set up 780 billion yuan 'Belt and Road" project financing window. Chinese and foreign companies have reached a commercial cooperation agreement of $ 97.2 billion, which will promote the construction of the "Belt and Road" high -quality development of the co -construction, injecting a strong motivation for global interconnection and promoting development and prosperity. "Exchange with friends in the Asia -Pacific business community, President Xi Jinping has hoped to build a" The bright future of the Belt and Road Initiative.

;

;“中国坚持走和平发展道路，发展的根本目的是让中国人民过上好日子，不是要取代谁。”在旧金山，习近平主席深刻指出，“工作得更好，生活得Better, children grow up better, and they are the earnest wishes of more than 1.4 billion Chinese people. "

;

; Looking back on the 30 -year extraordinary journey. As a member of the Asia -Pacific family, China's development starts in the Asia Pacific. Thanks to the Asia -Pacific; China, which is facing the future, will continue to focus on the Asia -Pacific and benefit the Asia -Pacific. The next "China" will still be China.

;

; "I would like to send you the most enthusiastic invitations, I hope you can attend the informal meeting of leaders of the Asia -Pacific Economic Cooperation Organization in 2024 and have a state visit to Peru again." The San Francisco meeting has not ended. The host President Bolu Alt has acted in advance. When President Xi Jinping met with him, President Bolu Alt couldn't wait to invite President Xi Jinping.

;

; Seeing a "30 years of gold", starting from San Francisco, for the common prosperity of the Asia -Pacific people and descendants, for the peace and development of the world, for the better future for human beings, President Xi Jinping led China in the new era China. The journey is thousands of miles, and move forward.

; ; Sun, 19 Nov 2023 05:26:03 +0800 02版要闻 - 坚守初心 团结合作 携手共促亚太高质量增长http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/19/nw.D110000renmrb_20231119_1-02.htm
; Sunday, November 19, 2023
; ;

; Dear President Biden,

;

; colleagues:

;

; I am very happy Gathering everyone in the beautiful San Francisco. This is the 30th time that APEC leaders have gathered together, which is of special significance. Thank you to President Biden and the US government for making thoughtful arrangements for this meeting.

;

; Since the establishment of a regular meeting mechanism for leaders in the Asia -Pacific Economic Cooperation Organization, it has always been at the forefront of the global open development, which has effectively promoted regional trade and investment liberalization, economic and technological development, and material flow, and created worldwide attention. "Asia -Pacific Miracle".

;

; At present, the World Centennial Change has accelerated the evolution, and the world economy is facing a variety of risk challenges. As a global growth engine, Asia -Pacific shoulder a greater time responsibility. As leaders of the Asia-Pacific region, we must think deeply about what kind of Asia-Pacific we want to bring to the middle of this century. How to create the next "golden thirty years" of Asia-Pacific development? How can APEC better play its role in this process?

;

; The ancient Chinese said: "Where the Tao is, although there are millions of people going." We should adhere to the original intention of Asia -Pacific cooperation, respond to the call of the times responsibly, work together to deal with global challenges, and fully implement Btella Gariah's vision, building an open, vibrant, strong, and peaceful Asia -Pacific community, and realize the common prosperity of the Asia -Pacific people and descendants. Here, I would like to make some suggestions.

;

; First, insist on innovation -driven. Innovation is a powerful driving force for development. We must follow the development trend of science and technology, promote scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation with a more active attitude, and work together to create an open, fair, just and non-discriminatory scientific and technological development environment. It is necessary to accelerate digital transformation, narrow the digital divide, accelerate the implementation of the "APEC Internet and Digital Economy Roadmap", support the application of new technologies such as big data, cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and quantum computing, and continuously shape new momentum and new advantages for the development of the Asia-Pacific.

;

; China adheres to the innovation -driven development strategy, coordinated to promote digital industrialization and digitalization of industrial, and proposes proposal initiatives such as the Asia -Pacific Economic Co -Organization Digital Rural Construction, Enterprise Digital identity, and using digital technology to promote green low -carbon transformation. Develop and empower.

;

; Second, persist in opening -up orientation. The experience of Asia-Pacific development tells us that if we are open, we will prosper, and if we are closed, we will decline. We must safeguard free and open trade and investment, support and strengthen the multilateral trading system with the World Trade Organization as its core, maintain the stability and smoothness of global industrial and supply chains, and oppose the politicization, weaponization and pan-security of economic and trade issues. We must unswervingly promote regional economic integration, accelerate the process of the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Area, fully implement the APEC Connectivity Blueprint, and share regional open development opportunities.

;

; Recently, China has successfully held the third "Belt and Road" international cooperation summit forum to inject new driving forces to promote global interconnection and build an open world economy. China adheres to the high-level implementation of the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement, actively aligns the high-standard economic and trade rules of the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership and the Digital Economy Partnership Agreement, actively promotes the process of joining the two agreements, and works with all parties to Together we draw a new picture of openness and development.

;

; Third, adhere to green development. In the face of increasingly severe challenges such as climate change and natural disasters, we must adhere to the harmonious coexistence of man and nature, accelerate the green and low-carbon transformation of the development model, coordinately promote carbon reduction, pollution reduction, green expansion and growth, and implement the "Biological Cycle Green" "Economic Bangkok Goals", laying a solid foundation for Asia-Pacific growth.

;

; China adheres to the road of ecological priority and green development, actively and steadily promote carbon peak carbon neutrality, and accelerate the green transformation of development methods. We propose APEC cooperation initiatives on green agriculture, sustainable cities, low-carbon energy transformation, and marine pollution prevention and control to promote joint efforts to build a clean and beautiful Asia-Pacific.

;

; Fourth, insist on inclusive sharing. Currently, global development is facing severe challenges and the development gap is widening. I have said many times that true development is achieved when everyone develops together. We must fully implement the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, push development issues back to the center of the international agenda, deepen the alignment of development strategies, and jointly solve the global development deficit. All parties are welcome to actively participate in global development initiatives, deepen cooperation in poverty reduction, food security, industrialization, development financing and other fields, and build a global development community so that people of all countries can share the fruits of modernization. China will continue to support APEC in carrying out economic and technological cooperation and jointly make the Asia-Pacific development pie bigger.

;

; colleagues!

;

; China is comprehensively promoting the construction of a strong country with Chinese -style modernization and a great cause of national rejuvenation. China adheres to the path of peaceful development. The fundamental purpose of development is to enable the Chinese people to live a good life, not to replace anyone. This year marks the 45th anniversary of China's reform and opening up. We will adhere to high-quality development, promote high-level opening up, and use Chinese-style modernization to provide new opportunities for promoting the modernization of countries around the world. I am willing to work with all my colleagues to promote Asia-Pacific cooperation to achieve more fruitful results and jointly create the next "golden thirty years" of Asia-Pacific!

;

; Thank you everyone.

;

; (Xinhua News Agency, San Francisco, November 17th)

It will continue to improve the protection mechanism of foreign investment rights and further reduce foreign businessmen to further reduce foreign businessmen The negative list of investment access, strive to break the barriers to restrict the flow of innovation elements, and deepen the reform of the digital economy. Facing the future, China's open door will only open and larger, bringing more market opportunities, growth opportunities, and cooperation opportunities to the world.

;

; President Xi Jinping emphasized: "The Chinese economy overcome challenges and moves forward steadily, and achieves high -quality development. This is also an inevitable requirement for promoting Chinese -style modernization." The new journey of Weiye, we are committed to solidifying to make all the Chinese people move towards modernization together; we are committed to common prosperity, so that every Chinese person lives a better life; we are committed to comprehensive development, so that people's material and spiritual world is equally rich ; Committed to sustainable development, let people live in harmony with nature; commit to peaceful development and promote the construction of a community of human destiny. It should be seen that the starting point and end point of Chinese -style modernization is to allow more than 1.4 billion Chinese people to live a better life. For the world, this means a broader market and unprecedented cooperation opportunities. Strong motivation. Looking forward to the future, a China continuously moving towards modernization will definitely provide more opportunities for the world, inject stronger driving force into international cooperation, and make greater contributions to all human progress.

;

; China is not pursuing the modernization of its own body. It is willing to realize the world's modernization of peaceful development, mutually beneficial cooperation, and common prosperity with countries. Welcome to actively participate in the process of modernization of Chinese -style modernization and share the huge huge brought by China's high -quality development in China opportunity. Always stand on the correct side of history and stand on the side of human civilization, share the avenue of the world, and promote the establishment of a community of human destiny, which will definitely create a better future for mankind.

;

; The past 38 years ago was like a few treasures. Being able to collect those years in the heart full of major events, only cherish and care for the friendship of far away.

;

; How thick ice and the tall courtyard wall will be dispelled by the heart.

;

; The exchanges between the country and the country are not always smooth. China and the United States have also separated for 22 years. It is a common interest that allows China and the United States to surpass the differences. The wishes of the people will break the ice.从一场“小球转动大球”的比赛，到一份有历史分量的中美“上海公报”，再到如今，7600亿美元双边贸易和累计2600多亿美元双向投资，284对友好省州和友好城市关系，最多每周300多个航班和每年500多万人次的相互往来……这是全世界近1/4人口共同绘就的宏伟画卷。

;

;“最近，飞虎队老兵、103岁高龄的莫耶和98岁高龄的麦克马伦来到中国，登上了长城，受到中国人民热烈欢迎。”习近平主席说到此处，将目光投向台下就坐的老兵，莫耶挥手致意。掌声响起，致敬并肩作战的峥嵘岁月。

;

;还有“鼓岭之友”的成员们，他们今天特意穿上了红色唐装、戴上红色领带，因为“在中国红色代表着喜庆”。

;

;近40分钟的演讲，座无虚席的宴会厅近二十次响起长时间热烈掌声。当然，还有笑声、赞叹声，有的老朋友听着听着又落下泪来。

;

;就在当天上午，中美元首达成共识，两国将推出更多便利人员往来、促进人文交流的措施。太平洋上将因此搭建起更多桥梁。

;

;中美关系的根基由人民浇筑，大门由人民打开，故事由人民书写，未来由人民创造。 “正是善意友好的涓滴汇流，让宽广太平洋不再是天堑；正是人民的双向奔赴，让中美关系一次次从低谷重回正道。”习近平主席动情地说。

;

;两国人民的友好故事，还在书写。

;

;;是挑战还是机遇？ ;

;

;;“展现大国格局、拿出大国担当、发挥大国作用”;

;

;世界对于中国这个“大块头”有着超乎寻常of curiosity. From one poor and two -in -largest developing countries and the world's second largest economy, China's growth rate and governance behind the governance of the country have paid attention to the world.

;

;中国之于世界，是挑战还是机遇？

;

;旧金山之行，是中国在世界讲台上的一次生动讲述。

;

;人们从习近平主席的丰富日程，不难读出何为“做好中国的事情，就是对世界最大的贡献”，何为“中国人民不仅希望自己过得好，也希望各国人民过得好”。

;

;一个占世界人口近1/5的大国，创造了人类减贫史上的奇迹。晚宴演讲时，习近平主席分享了他的亲历。 8年时间让近1亿人摆脱贫困，堪称“彪炳史册的人间奇迹”。这一进程，“提前10年实现了联合国2030年可持续发展议程的减贫目标”。

;

;一个占世界陆地面积1/15的大国，致力于永续发展。无论是《巴黎协定》的落实，还是“碳达峰碳中和”目标的践行，中国在行动。 “我们不说大话，我们说到做到”。雷鸣般的掌声，激荡着中国一次次“言必信，行必果”的回响。

;

;一个昔日积贫积弱、百废待兴的国家，探索出了一条迥异于西方的中国式现代化道路，创造了人类文明新形态。这是“勇敢者的创造”。

;

;习近平主席向拜登总统、向美国人民深刻阐释了中国式现代化。它的五个特征，对应着团结奋斗、共同富裕、全面发展、永续发展、和平发展。

;

;有国际问题观察者这样评析这段演讲：“从每一句话里都能发现中国的所思所想，发现中国的机遇。我们都知道，中国机遇也是世界的机遇。”

;

;那么，发展起来的中国，于美国而言，是威胁吗？

;

;“修昔底德陷阱”几乎已经被视为国际关系的“铁律”。时光流转到21世纪，中美关系成为新的焦点。宽广的地球有没有足够空间容纳中美两个大国？习近平主席就此多次强调：“世界上本无'修昔底德陷阱'，但大国之间一再发生战略误判，就可能自己给自己造成'修昔底德陷阱'。”

;

;跨越太平洋，路在脚下。

;

;“作为世界上最大的发展中国家和发达国家，中美要好好打交道。面对变乱交织的世界，中美更需要有宽广的胸怀，展现大国格局、拿出大国担当、发挥大国作用。”中国站在了历史正确的一边。

;

;政治外交、人文交流、全球治理、军事安全……此次中美元首会晤，达成20多项共识，涉及全球治理秩序各个维度，为变乱交织的世界注入稳定性和正能量.

;

;在气候变化、禁毒、人工智能等重要领域加强合作；就共同关心的巴以冲突等国际和地区问题交换意见……会晤桌前、宴会厅里，中美元首着眼的不仅是双边关系，也有地区和世界正待解决的棘手难题。

;

;解决人类社会面临的麻烦离不开大国合作。

;

;而合作的方式、路径以及诚意，决定着结果。习近平主席就此提出两点。一是“做表率”“向全球提供更多公共产品”；二是“双方提出的倡议要彼此开放，也可以协调对接，形成合力，造福世界”。

;

;旧金山之行前夕，第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛刚刚成功举办。十年，沧海一粟，却创造了沧桑巨变。

;

;“中方提出的共建'一带一路'倡议以及全球发展倡议、全球安全倡议、全球文明倡议，始终面向各国开放，包括美国。中方也愿参与美国提出的多边合作倡议。”计利当计天下利，这是中国的襟怀。

;

;演讲时，有一处掌声格外持久，那是习近平主席分享心声时。

;

;忆起年轻时在陕北小村子下乡，他动情地说：“从那时到现在，半个世纪过去了，在人民中间让我觉得踏实，同人民在一起让我有力量。我将无我、不负人民，这就是我终生的信念。”会场又是一次热烈掌声。

;

;终生的信念，也是理解中国的逻辑起点。 “人民对美好生活的向往就是我们的奋斗目标，就是必须守住的人民的心。”

;

;为了人民，也依靠人民。在会见友好人士时，习近平主席接见了著有《红星照耀中国》的埃德加·斯诺的后人亚当·福斯特。他说：“中国人民一直记着斯诺，是他最早向世界介绍了中国红军。”

;

;今天的世界对于中国的印象，一如这本书里所传递的，经历了长征洗礼愈挫愈勇，对前途满怀信念和向往。

;

;“脱钩断链”“筑墙设垒”，纵使风高浪急、雨骤云屯，“一切打压和遏制只会激发中国人民的意志和热情”。庄园会晤时，习近平主席坚定地说：“中国的发展壮大有内生逻辑，是外部力量阻挡不了的。”

;

;这里的内生逻辑，扎根于中华民族的苦难辉煌，滋养于中国人民的磅礴力量。云海万里，以心相望。
